text: 18.111 Vacant sites and incidental open spaces or lawn spaces within housing estates and elsewhere in the borough have the potential to be used for community gardening and food growing with relatively minimal investment. Part 3 provides support for such uses. 340 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES 18.112 There is potential for land to contain contaminated soil with harmful substances such as heavy metals and asbestos. Prior to the use of a site for food growing, a land contamination assessment will need to be undertaken to ensure that the soil does not exceed the Soil Guideline Values and would not pose an immediate risk to public health. This would be undertaken prior to a development proposals approval or as a condition. BIODIVERSITY AND OPEN SPACE Tower Hamlets Local Plan 341 MOVEMENT AND CONNECTIVITY 19.
